website_summaries.verdict: High-end, tweezers calibrated for precision to grab even the smallest, finest hairs.
pros: Stubborn chin hairs meet their match in these perfectly-tensioned tweezers
Rubber cap for protection when stored
cons: May dull quickly, which limits their effectiveness

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t grab hair. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’d heard rave reviews for these tweezers so I splurged and bought them when my old ones disappeared. These are TERRIBLE. The hairs slip and the point won’t grab hair at all. They are misaligned and not connecting at the tip. What’s the point of tweezers that don’t connect? They’re equivalent to the $5 tweezers from Walmart. I’m hoping I got a knockoff pair because this is ridiculous. I’m returning them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Julia H

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Tweezers
customer_reviews.text: I have had these tweezers since 2014! And they are still sharp till this day 2 years later. I think brows are everything. I always wanted a perfect arch but was never able to get it. When I purchased these tweezers definition became my life. With a light hand & the correct brow products (you may have to spend a little money) you can make a huge difference to the structure of the face.. I believe after using the Anastasia line my eye area look softer, younger & more open. Much more elegant.﻿
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: "lost" the pink one I got in an Anastasia set about 18 yrs ago (lost last Sept/Oct) so naturally I found it the night before this one arrived. $30 is a lot for tweezers but you'll never need another one and I originally paid $80
customer_reviews.author: TexasTrainer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work-Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have many pairs of tweezerman through the years. Over time they do not align and I did not have success with sharpening. I was so excited to try these. I had heard wonderful reviews. I tried them and they did not work, I could not get them to pull 1 hair. Not sure if reviews are true about counterfeit but mine also came in plastic sleeve. Stop selling if they are fake Amazon, it is costing you money and wasting my time.
customer_reviews.author: Jkp5jkp

customer_reviews.title: These are FAKE. Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve ever received an item from someone on amazon that was NOT real. The tweezers I received were NOT Anastasia tweezers. I have purchased at least a dozen pairs of these tweezers over he last 20 years as it’s my favorite brand by far. These tweezers weren’t anything close to the real brand. I literally laughed out loud when I looked at them. Basically someone found a way to print the logo on the side of other cheap tweezers and sell them. Terrible seller and should be stopped.
customer_reviews.author: jenniferjoy

customer_reviews.title: I thought maybe it was a fluke and exchanged them for another pair and recieved the second pair in what appeared to be a different sized sleeve than the first and these worked slightly better but no better than ones you would buy from ...
customer_reviews.text: I think these are counterfeit as I ordered a pair and they came in a cheap unsealed plastic sleeve and after trying to use them I couldn't even pluck a thick hair out with them. I thought maybe it was a fluke and exchanged them for another pair and recieved the second pair in what appeared to be a different sized sleeve than the first and these worked slightly better but no better than ones you would buy from a gas station. I find this hard to believe that these are authentic as I would doubt that anyone would buy such expensive tweezers that did not perform.
customer_reviews.author: Draco

customer_reviews.title: High quality great price
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy other brands, even other well known brands. They have gone downhill. These are wonderful! Work like tweezers should. Grab on to hairs barely poking out of skin and tough hairs to. Spend a few extra dollars and save yourself the grief of using cheap brands and digging at your skin/hairs to remove.
customer_reviews.author: PHAC

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of tweezers I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these tweezers and I love them. I'm an esthetician and have tried a lot of different types of tweezers and these are by far the best. They can pull out even the shortest, thinnest hair. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: S or G

customer_reviews.title: Tweezers that work!!
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers really work. Purchased another brand that had higher reviews than these but did not work as well. I contacted the company to make sure I was not getting a knock off and they responded right away. I received the real thing. Highly recommend these tweezers.
customer_reviews.author: Boricua

customer_reviews.title: NO BUENO!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to leave a bad review but these are the second pair of tweezers I ordered and they both were horrible. I returned the first pair but ran out of time to return the second. I previously bought the same tweezers at Sephora, which were great, but the last two ordered on Amazon won't grab the hairs at all! I recently ordered Rubis Switzerland tweezers which were a little more expensive but I am so happy with them. Don't waste your money on these tweezers. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Leslianne

customer_reviews.title: Very precise tweezers!
customer_reviews.text: The Anastasia tweezers are the only ones that I purchase. They are very precise. The Amazon price beats Sephora, and I don't have to go to the mall! Remember to keep the rubber tip on the tweezers when you are not using them, and they will last a very long. Also, be careful not to drop them as that will make them less precise.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: The price is worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these tweezers! The price is 100% worth it. You can grab every little hair with minimal effort compared to a cheap drug store brand where it can take you twice as long or even three times as long to do the same job. I lost my original pair of ABH tweezers and bought a pair of drugstore tweezers on the go and what a waste of money that was. I finally bought another pair of ABH tweezers and I'm mad at myself that I didn't buy them sooner
customer_reviews.author: Shawntelle Flanders

customer_reviews.title: I had a pair of tweezers that I absolutely loved from Avon and those finally broke on me
customer_reviews.text: The are insanely sharp so be careful! I had a pair of tweezers that I absolutely loved from Avon and those finally broke on me. After some research, I decided on these tweezers. Although they do get the job done, they are so sharp that I have cut myself quite a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: If you rely on using your tweezers every day for facial hair, I can assure you that they pull from the root with great precision and will be an important part of your daily, essential beauty routine. I give it a 4-star “value” rating due to the price, but am happy to say I love these tweezers and am glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was ridiculous to spend this much money on a tweezers but I was so wrong. This tweezers is worth every penny and I really wish I had bought it much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Precision
customer_reviews.text: This is what I've wanted for so long and spend so much money on useless tweezers. Please keep the quality high, I'll be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical to super fan
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about purchasing these tweezers. I had a very good pair that lasted me 15+ years and all of the sudden they just stopped working. I didn't want to spend countless dollars searching for another pair like them (they were from qvc) I did some research and found that these rated best. Pretty expensive but I thought if this is a one time shop its worth it. Luckily it was. They work very well. Im very pleased with them. The search is over before it really even started.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these and how precise they are.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought three pairs of these off Amazon. They’re the best tweezers I’ve ever had. They have a sharp edge that is more precise than other tweezers I’ve used and it makes it easy to get short or difficult hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: These tweezers didn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy these tweezers ... save your money. You have been warned! I didn’t read the reviews. For the money these should have been a tweezer precision dream. I made the mistake of thinking price equaled quality. Not worth the money. They didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tweezers!
customer_reviews.text: I had done a little research on tweezers, as I had not had very good luck with the ones I've purchased in the past, and had seen that these tweezers were rated in the top 10. I ordered these tweezers, and am very pleased with them. I feel like they're the quality I had been looking for and that I'll get many years of use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Leona Alexander

customer_reviews.title: was useless after5 months
customer_reviews.text: purchased in Jan and discarded in May due to dullness. No longer worked. Not what I expect from a $28 pair of tweezers
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L. Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.......
customer_reviews.text: Yes......disappointing........as previously mentioned......for hygiene purposes, I did not return the tweezers.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: ... years ago after I saw them on Oprah and love them and still use them
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pink pair of Anastasia tweezers years ago after I saw them on Oprah and love them and still use them. Then I thought it was time for a new pair and ordered these. I wanted to return them but missed it by one day of return day which most Amazon products don't even have. They don't work at all and don't tweeze your hairs at all. Very disappointed. Are these knock offs?
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rockey

customer_reviews.title: Only Tweezers I'll Buy
customer_reviews.text: Best tweezers you can buy! I'm not sure what metal is used at tip, but it's soft and suspect it's what makes them so good - if you drop these tweezers and they hit metal side first, the tip will be affected and the tweezers no good - just make sure you keep the small, silicone cover on tip!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these tweezers for my daughter, daughters in law and my granddaughter. I think giving personal grooming items is supposed to be a no no but they all loved and appreciated them
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Campagna

customer_reviews.title: Pluck pluck!
customer_reviews.text: Top notch tweezers and they work very well, however, I think for the price that Anastasia should offer a limited or even lifetime warranty on, but unfortunately they don't. After about 2 years, mine needed replacing and I emailed them to find out there was nothing they could do, so you must be extra careful with them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME..... even gets the tiny hairs
customer_reviews.text: These are EXCELLENT....... Finally a pair that actually grabs tiny hairs.....
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I would sat I love the Tweezers. They work better than any other tweezer I have used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: precise
customer_reviews.text: Very precise tweezers. A little spendy, but worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Karin Covely

customer_reviews.title: tweezers are good but not quite sensitive enough
customer_reviews.text: They're study and precise but sometimes break hairs rather than pulling them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless, terrible
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these tweezers. They do not work. And to make matters worse, they pinch the skin. When I bought my first Anastasia tweezer I thought it was defective and sent it back. But the second pair was no better. I purchased Anastasia because a supposedly independent website highly recommended them as the best possible tweezers on the market. Baloney!! These are useless, and I waited too long to return them so I'm stuck with a worthless piece of you know what.
customer_reviews.author: S.edmiston

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product, but still have trouble getting those shorter hairs.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on this were excellent and I do love it, but it isn't as precise as I'd hoped. It is good, don't get me wrong, and clearly a quality product, but still struggle to grasp the shorter, but apparent, hairs.
customer_reviews.author: MadreLobo

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This
customer_reviews.text: Big disappointment! I have used this tweezer for years but this is not like the original. The tips are shaped differently and do not do the job so I went back to my old one. I will try Tweezerman. It's a waste of $30
customer_reviews.author: Murphy Burns

customer_reviews.title: Should Have Returned
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t work for me. Too thick so not good for short hairs. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use twisters for different things and what I used it for it was seamless and did the job. Sometimes you luck up and buy some regular twizzers from the beauty supply store but I literally had to google what are the best twizzers and Anastasia Beverly Hills is on point.
customer_reviews.author: MARSHA

customer_reviews.title: your company's concept of "precision"
customer_reviews.text: your tweezers are not "precision" made ... unable to utilize for ingrown and fine hairs despite the higher sale price.
customer_reviews.author: eleni

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these Tweezers! Totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair I've had in a long time that actually grab the small hairs and the ones that are broke off. I can even get the thin hairs! Maybe a little sharp for some people but I've had sharper tweezers before.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke T.

customer_reviews.title: better than expected & better than described
customer_reviews.text: better than expected & better than described. they really do get the hairs out of your eyebrows without breaking them off short. i laughed at myself for spending this much on a set of tweezers, of all things... but if you have the money, they ARE worth it.
customer_reviews.author: lish

customer_reviews.title: Best tweezers I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best tweezers I’ve ever used. Not sure what makes these better they just are. They’re able capture the tiniest and faintest of hairs with ease, even better than Tweezernan which I considered top quality.
customer_reviews.author: L. E. Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very pricey but I do like the grab on these tweezers.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Would not grab ahold of hairs. Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: I think it's a knock off
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several of this brand of tweezers over the years at various beauty supply stores. Those were always so sharp and on point when I first received them. This one was dull and didn't remove hair as well. It felt like one of my old ones, not a new one.
customer_reviews.author: JMDRN

customer_reviews.title: Best tweezers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tweezers for myself at a department store and paid a little bit more for them. These were a better price on Amazon from this seller. I love these tweezers. They really grip the eyebrow hair securely, unlike every other pair of tweezers I have purchased over the years. I bought another pair from this seller for my daughter at Christmas, and she loves them them too. I will not use any other kind from now on. These are good quality and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Canyon Home Reflections, LLC

customer_reviews.title: the best tweezers
customer_reviews.text: i have been looking for these tweezers in store for ever now and when i found them on amazon i was so excited i didn’t have to wait so long to get them. these tweezers are everything you will never need or want any other ones ever!! i have gone through 4 of these bc i keep loosing them but trust me worth every penny i’ve spent
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using tweezers for years and have never found one I've been really happy with until now. It's a pleasure to know that when I need to use tweezers I have one I can count on to do to the job.
customer_reviews.author: HFogel

customer_reviews.title: THE PERFECT TWEEZER
customer_reviews.text: INDUSTRIAL!!! BEST TWEEZERS EVER!!! i have used tweezerman for 35 years...i will never go back.. these incredible tweezer!!
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste money
customer_reviews.text: They suck it says you can get the little hair and it doesn't break them well they lie. They are horrible and not worth the money. My $2 pair from shop rite works better
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I am sure these are fake , I purchased another one for my daughter about a month ago , which was really good . This one is not working , they arrived in a weired package ( see picture ), not professional at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very well made & very precise for grooming. I received the true brand and not a knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Were not high quality tweezers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these thinking they would be high quality tweezers....to my disappointment they were 2nd hand quality or even knock-offs. My husband even tried to make them work..hairs slipped right through the ends...will not but these again. I purchased similar ones at Ulta with a pink painted cover..they were so much better and they too were Anastasia...don't waste your money on these!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tweezers
customer_reviews.text: I feel it's hard to grasp hairs and the edges are so sharp that sometimes they scratch my skin.
customer_reviews.author: john david

customer_reviews.title: And they also looked like the metal tips were slightly discolored
customer_reviews.text: These are supposed to be so highly rated yet they wouldn't grip one single hair. And they also looked like the metal tips were slightly discolored.
customer_reviews.author: SMJ

customer_reviews.title: Love these so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these tweezers a couple of times, but they have been great so far. They have a great grip and get the finest hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money- don’t work
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy and use these infamous tweezers and at first they were a dream but after about a week and a half they were completely useless and I assure you that I took excellent care of them. Unless you don’t mind throwing your money away buy a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t verify authentic. Not as good as my authentic one!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these were authentic. They didn’t seem to pull hair like my authentic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t worth the cost unless I got a bad pair but you would think that the cost would ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not come together to tweeze. Wasn’t worth the cost unless I got a bad pair but you would think that the cost would provide a superior tweezer.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: I just don't find that they are great or worth what they cost
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. I just don't find that they are great or worth what they cost. They are pink...but that doesn't help enough. I am naturally blonde and my eyebrow hairs are fine. If I don't get the hair just right, the grip is not there.
customer_reviews.author: IndyGirlJane

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these tweezers
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these tweezers! They get all the short stubborn hairs, and they're great at getting out slivers embedded in skin
customer_reviews.author: Shirrl

customer_reviews.title: So Great I Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Although pricey, these are hands-down the BEST tweezers I've ever owned. They will get the most microscopic hair or splinter out. They are sharp so be careful but you only have to pluck at things once.
customer_reviews.author: WCoyote

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to replace my favorite fancy shmancy tweezers that my mom passed to me
customer_reviews.text: These haven't worked as well as a very cheap pair I have. I bought these to replace my favorite fancy shmancy tweezers that my mom passed to me, but that my daughter recently borrowed and sadly lost. I was hoping these would be worth the price, but they aren't.
customer_reviews.author: Charlee Ziegler Hilgerdt

customer_reviews.title: Very precise
customer_reviews.text: Worth the $. Very precise but use gently cause they are sharp and will pinch.
customer_reviews.author: marilynn

customer_reviews.title: Knockoffs, horrible
customer_reviews.text: Don't work. I'm pretty sure the ones they sent me are knockoffs. They don't grab the hairs and are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of tweezers you will ever own
customer_reviews.text: These really are every bit as good as other reviewers have stated. Just remember to clean them in Alcohol and they will last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: lucky louie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tweezers
customer_reviews.text: The best tweezers me and my wife have ever used
customer_reviews.author: ryan carlson

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a manufacture problem
customer_reviews.text: Returned them twice. The blades appear off and they don’t pluck. It’s like a manufacture problem. I have had them before and they were the best tweezer but these last two were horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Hendra

customer_reviews.title: No packaging, looked used.
customer_reviews.text: The tweezers I ordered did not come in a box or any packaging, looked used, and had a sticker wrapped around them which left a strong sticky residue that soap and water did not wash away. I love Anastasia's tweezers and use Amazon frequently, but will not buy personal grooming products from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing tweezers
customer_reviews.text: Sorry disappointed the items were not like the ones previously ordered marked precision but the tweezers looked thicker and cheaper for a $56 purchase not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Drugstore brands are bad
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Drugstore brands are bad, so I ordered this with great hopes. Worse than the ones I have bought at Walmart. I have coarse eyebrows and it won’t even grab those.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get my money’s worth
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waist your money. Order this and a $17.00 set of ZB tweezers. The cheaper ZB outshines this product in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Piper_SAT

customer_reviews.title: No Grip
customer_reviews.text: I've been using tweezers for over 30 years on eyebrows and chin - this has little to no grip at all. I'm very disappointed that I cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: add multiplayer

customer_reviews.title: Second pair, loyal customer
customer_reviews.text: My second pair after losing my first....Sad face. These are worth the $, don't over think it, every time you pull them out you'll be happy you spent the money! I cant stand faulty tweezers!
customer_reviews.author: roshambo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This tweezer is no better than a cheap tweezerman tool. It does not grab as well as it claims and the hair does break off
customer_reviews.author: private

customer_reviews.title: tweezer
customer_reviews.text: I love the Anastasia product; i have had 3 tweezers before. THis one I ordered from Amazon was not the same as the ones previously purchased at an upscale retailer. Much thicker tip and didnt catch any hairs
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Tweezer is okay
customer_reviews.text: Not as fine as I would have thought Anastasia of Beverly Hills would offer, especially since they specialize in brows. Does not always work well with those ultra fine hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Therese A. Livermore

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality. Picks up the finest hairs. Would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: pookie21west

customer_reviews.title: Best tweezers. I do find that the grip does ...
customer_reviews.text: Best tweezers. I do find that the grip does wear down so figure you will need to replace after a year or two.
customer_reviews.author: ZLC

customer_reviews.title: DId not work at all. Returned it the day ...
customer_reviews.text: DId not work at all. Returned it the day I got it!
customer_reviews.author: N. A. Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior now, and have had to tweeze my eyebrows daily since I was 15--these are the BEST by far I have ever bought and would highly recommend this brand. They grip the hairs firmly and am able to tweeze on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne V.

customer_reviews.title: BEST TWEEZERS
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the BEST tweezers on the market! Hair does not slip out of its grasp at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: They look like they have been used and I am totally grossed ...
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers did not come in a box. They had scratches all over them and won’t close tight enough to pull hair out. They look like they have been used and I am totally grossed out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different tweezers and none work. This is the only brand that actually gets the hair out. Totally worth paying the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Bell

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers must have been defective- they wouldn’t have grabbed a horse hair. Seems like sides weren’t making contact with eachother so they wouldn’t grab anything. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Padawer

customer_reviews.title: missing cap for tweezer
customer_reviews.text: im missing the cap for my tweezer. can you resend
customer_reviews.author: William H Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love these tweezers so far. Very sharp and tweeze great! Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Tweezers!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best tweezers! They’re a little sharp so be careful but they can grab the tiniest hairs!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to tweezers and have been for over ten years now
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The tweezers are the most amazing tweezers I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The tweezers are the most amazing tweezers I’ve ever owned. This is my second one because the first was sadly lost while traveling- I was heartbroken. I highly recommend these to anyone plucking anything!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: By that I mean than the two angled points on the tweezer do not line up properly to allow for a good working situation
customer_reviews.text: I would not rate this product any more than one star because the tweezer is not balanced. By that I mean than the two angled points on the tweezer do not line up properly to allow for a good working situation.. A hate of money, and that's too bad as they were well rated
customer_reviews.author: Lin duBois

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of your cheap tweezers and buy these!  You will be happy!
customer_reviews.text: Throw away your cheap tweezers that lose their spring after a yr or two...these are the last ones you will ever need, very much worth the price! Gets hairs I didnt even see lol!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's ok. i had high expectations for what this tweezer cost.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: No better than generic brand from Walgreens and probably not as ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the high price tag. No better than generic brand from Walgreens and probably not as good as those either
customer_reviews.author: icnuthin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow - what a lovely little luxury item - I don't know how it works so well, but it makes "from the drugstore" tweezers seem as effective as salad tongs! Worth every penny in effectiveness, time saved and frustration avoided. Wish I'd bought them years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Crescent1

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced like way overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to pick the hairs my 2 dollars tweezers are WAY BETTER thank these overpriced Anastasia”ones.
customer_reviews.author: LINSI PIXX

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on these!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Anastasia tweezers in the past. These can't be authentic. I ordered 3 pair for my brow salon use. These are HORRIBLE! It would be easier to pull the hair out with your fingers. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were amazing. Theses didn’t have a tight tip
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned a pair of theses in the past. I had them for 10 years. They were amazing. Theses didn’t have a tight tip. I ordered 2 pairs. I have a $4 pair of tweezers that work better.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love these tweezers!
customer_reviews.text: These by far are my favorite tweezers, they stay sharp for long without getting dull.
customer_reviews.author: Mena

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tweezers...they have plucked even the shortest of eyebrow hairs easily. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Fake...?
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved the Anastasia Precision Tweezers, but this product was far from what I have owned in the past.
customer_reviews.author: G.J.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: No way that these are professional choice. They don’t grab. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Renay Robison-Scheer

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Product is defective and dull since day 1. Impossible to pull any hair. I think a fake product may have been sent to me as. Wish I could get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills - Precision Tweezers
product_meta.description: Color:Precision TweezersStainless steel, slant-tip tweezers are handcrafted for salon-quality brow grooming.
feature_bullets: High-quality, slant-tip stainless-steel tweezers that remove stray hairs for salon-quality brow grooming.
The precise tip is designed to perfectly grab and pull out hairs by the root and remove even the shortest of brow hairs
The tapered blade with a slanted tip provides for expert hair removal
Perfect tension maintains bounce-back for control
Includes a protective rubber cap for safe storage and to protect tweezer blade when not in use

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
